name: No Free Refuels
description:
No Free Refuels is an arcade-style twin-stick shooter made for the Amaze Me Game Jam.  You play as a spaceship out in deep space, under attack by enemies who have valuable resources!  Your objective is to get all those resources and refill all four of the nearby fuel tanks.  Be careful--each type of enemy can only be destroyed by a certain type of ammunition!

CREDITS

Game by me!

Music by Faygo Princess
